    C

    cards - package cards
     
    Cards - Class in cards
    Represents a card in the game with a name, value, and effect.
    Cards(String, int, String) - Constructor for class cards.Cards
    Constructs a card with the specified name, value, and effect description.
    cardToPlay - Variable in class Game.Player
     
    checkForCountessAndRoyal() - Method in class Game.Player
    Checks if the player's hand contains both the Countess and either the King or Prince.
    client - Variable in class ServerClient.Client
     
    client - Variable in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
     
    Client - Class in ServerClient
    Represents a client that connects to a server and handles sending and receiving messages.
    Client() - Constructor for class ServerClient.Client
     
    Client.InputHandler - Class in ServerClient
    Handles user input in a separate thread, allowing the client to send messages to the server asynchronously while still receiving messages.
    clientCounter - Variable in class ServerClient.Server
     
    command3Cards() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /3cards command, revealing the three discarded cards if only two players are in the game.
    commandBirthday(String) - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /bd (birthday) command, allowing the player to input their birthdate.
    commandBye() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /bye command, allowing the player to leave the server.
    commandCardsInfo() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /cardsInfo command, sends information about the different card types and their effects to the player.
    commandCreate() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Handles the /create command to create a new game.
    commandDate(String) - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /date command, allowing the player to input the number of days since their last date.
    commandHelp() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Provides a list of available commands to the client.
    commandJoin() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Handles the /join command to join an existing game.
    commandNoJoin() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Handles the /noJoin command to leave the server without joining the game.
    commandNumber(String) - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /number command, allowing the player to choose a number for the Guard card's effect.
    commandPlay(String) - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /play command, allowing the player to play a specified card from their hand.
    commandPlayers() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /players command, providing a list of all players currently in the game.
    commandPrivate(String) - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Handles the /private command to send a private message.
    commandScore() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /score command, providing the current score for each player in the game.
    commandStart() - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /start command, initiating the game if enough players have joined.
    commandTarget(String) - Method in class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Processes the /target command, allowing the player to select a target for their current card action.
    compareDiscardedCardsValue() - Method in class Game.Game
    Compares the discarded card values of players to determine the winner when there is a tie.
    compareValueOfCards() - Method in class Game.Game
    Compares the values of players' current cards to determine the round winner when the deck is empty.
    connectionHandler - Variable in class Game.Player
     
    ConnectionHandler(Socket, Server) - Constructor for class ServerClient.Server.ConnectionHandler
    Constructs a ConnectionHandler for a specific client.
    connectionsMap - Variable in class ServerClient.Server
    Map of all connected clients, where the key is the player's nickname and the value is the connection handler.
    Countess - Class in cards
    Represents the "Countess" card in the game.
    Countess() - Constructor for class cards.Countess
    Constructs a Countess card with a predefined name, value, and effect description.
